item.title: Dropbox unveils new tools to enhance productivity
item.description:
Source: Dropbox website. Dropbox aims to simplify content creation, sharing, and teamwork through its new features. Users can now create new Microsoft Office files, upload photos, or scan documents directly through the Dropbox iPhone app using the plus button. A Dropbox badge shows who is currently working on the same Microsoft Word, PowerPoint, or Excel files, preventing work duplication or loss. Microsoft co-authoring enables real-time collaboration on Microsoft Office files online, eliminating email exchanges...
Read The Full Article :https://Nexus-Security.github.io/dropbox-unveils-new-tools-to-enhance-productivity/
